title: TOP 10 TIPS FOR YOUR TRACTOR'S 3 POINT HITCH!

subtasks: Get tractor in park position
Check if ground is level, otherwise parking on level ground
Use pallet to raise attachments off ground
Align center link with top pin position on three-point hitch
Attach lower links first by lining up with top pin
If needed, use tractor to raise bottom link to attach to other pins
Attach top link using locking or jam nut adjustment
Adjust top link for forward/backward tilt or side-to-side leveling
Use hitch assist feature to raise/lower three-point hitch from operator seat
Hook up rear PTO shaft by aligning splines and using collar/push button to secure
Demonstrate using quick hitch for easier attachment and detachment

tasks.task: Show tips for three-point hitch operation and PTO engagement
subtasks: Explain the rate of drop control and timing for lowering attachments
Demonstrate PTO select lever to engage different shafts
Align PTO splines using the mid or rear shaft position
Explain hydraulic adjustments for top and side links in three-point hitch
Describe the use of sway arm for more flexible three-point hitch setup

tasks.task: Set up and operate three-point hitch attachments
subtasks: Position tractor and attachment on level ground
Align three-point hitch center link with top pin
Connect lower and top links while ensuring proper hitch position
Adjust hitch angles as needed for specific implements
Switch PTO engagement using different tractor settings
Release and re-engage PTO shaft securely
Use quick hitch for smooth attachment/detachment of implements

tasks.task: Install and secure quick hitch on tractor
subtasks: Raise three-point hitch to access quick hitch connection points
Attach quick hitch pins to the standard ASAE spacing
Position implements for simple and quick hitch connections
Use top link adjustment for precise implement leveling

tasks.task: Utilize hitch assist and operator station controls
subtasks: Operate hitch assist to lower/raise three-point hitch from seat
Use linkage adjustments during hitching process
Adjust tilt and lift while moving tractor forward/backward

tasks.task: Set up and operate mid PTO shaft
subtasks: Position PTO select lever to engage mid PTO
Align and secure mid PTO shaft splines

tasks.task: Modify three-point hitch attachments for optimal performance
subtasks: Adjust hydraulic settings for easier lift and lower rates
Fine-tune implement tilt angles for better ground contact
Select appropriate attachments based on ground conditions and traction needs
